name: Buck Dodger In: The Showdown on Ceres
name_original: Buck Dodger In: The Showdown on Ceres
description:
You are Buck Dodger, the wildest space cowboy this side of the asteroid belt. You've just stolen from the most powerful group in the solar system: the Galilei Corporation. With their thugs on your tail, you and your trusty steel steed Silicon must shoot for the stars and make it to the planet Ceres before it's too late.

How to Play:

Dodge and blow your way through obstacles to reach the launch pad at the end of the level before the enemies catch up to you. Keep an eye on the enemy distance at top and the charge shows you when you can attack again.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys - Move

Space / Shift - Attack

This game was made in about a week for the Snappy Gurus Game Off - Winter 2023 Jam. We faced many hurdles, but managed to get one level complete out of a planned three, please excuse how the game ends abruptly.

Special Thanks to Alina for assembling the team, even though you were too sick to help during the jam!
